trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [black cards total v] to [0] set [index v] to [1] ask [Please enter a row of black and white cards (B for black and W for white):] and wait set [cards v] to (answer) repeat (length of (cards)) if <(letter (index) of (cards)) = [B]> then change [black cards total v] by (1) end change [index v] by (1) end if <((black cards total) mod (2)) = [0]> then say [There is no parity error in this row!] else say [There is a parity error in this row!] end
